xrpl_js_summary.description: JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for XRP Ledger integration, supporting Node.js v20+ and browsers. Handles keys, transactions, requests, subscriptions, parsing.

core_components.Client: WebSocket connections to rippled (methods: connect, disconnect, request, submit, fundWallet)

xrpl_js_summary.usage_patterns: Async operations, validated ledger queries, error handling, production rippled servers.
xrpl_js_summary.best_practices: Use xrpl.org for concepts, js.xrpl.org for reference. Subscribe to mailing lists for updates.

version_notes: Recommended for advanced features like IOUs, DEX, multi-signing.
